The Asylum: Psychiatric Clinic for Abused Cuddly Toys

name: The Asylum: Psychiatric Clinic for Abused Cuddly Toys
summary: Made by the Dutch stuffed toy company, Parapleusch, you psychoanalyze a group of distressed toys who are going through major emotional breakdowns.
